channel.title: I want to make a 2D, 3rd person , MMORPG [MOVE TOPIC TO CORRECT PLACE IF NEEDED]
channel.description: Ok so we are going to start out with 2D then move onto 3D when we get everything going and good for awhile.Ok so I would like to make a 2D , 3rd Person , MMORPG , of course this is going to take a while and thought well through. I have a partner that I am going to be doing it will , be know nothing about coding , but it does seem Microsoft Visual C++ is a good coding system or w/e.I want it to be really good. I don't like the idea of using someone else's game engine though, I want it to be professional , like Runescape or Tibia , which they probably have their own game engines. I think it would be good to make my own, for me to be able to do things. Ok so I want my own game and own engine (maybe) , then put it online . This will be a huge project and really fun. If you post try to make things simple when explaining, or correct me on things. Give me good download links etc. Tell me is C++ a good coder etc. I want all your feedback and everything to help. Btw i am starting out with a x10hosting website, which i will have to learn html , and stuff. So if you know anything about x10hosting post that too! Give me all the tips you can! Be very criticizing. If you want to "show" me how to do something I have TeamViewer. If you want to talk to me i have skype, windows live , email etc! This is going to be a very big good game! Anything about forums using , website hosting , domains , all that I want to know everything I can and I will take all things into consideration. Plus read my forum post on "What would you like to see in a game" and post there too the link is: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,547048.0.html

item.title: I want to make a 2D, 3rd person , MMORPG [MOVE TOPIC TO CORRECT PLACE IF NEEDED]
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Ok, first of all, if you know nothing about programming, then you’re going to have quite some difficulty creating a 3D game. Second of all, you should be focusing on your actual game and its content rather than your website/domain.

item.source: I want to make a 2D, 3rd person , MMORPG [MOVE TOPIC TO CORRECT PLACE IF NEEDED]

item.title: I want to make a 2D, 3rd person , MMORPG [MOVE TOPIC TO CORRECT PLACE IF NEEDED]
item.dc:creator: @corbinzscape corbinzscape
item.description:
@corbinzscape wrote:

Ok so we are going to start out with 2D then move onto 3D when we get everything going and good for awhile.Ok so I would like to make a 2D , 3rd Person , MMORPG , of course this is going to take a while and thought well through. I have a partner that I am going to be doing it will , be know nothing about coding , but it does seem Microsoft Visual C++ is a good coding system or w/e.I want it to be really good. I don’t like the idea of using someone else’s game engine though, I want it to be professional , like Runescape or Tibia , which they probably have their own game engines. I think it would be good to make my own, for me to be able to do things. Ok so I want my own game and own engine (maybe) , then put it online . This will be a huge project and really fun. If you post try to make things simple when explaining, or correct me on things. Give me good download links etc. Tell me is C++ a good coder etc. I want all your feedback and everything to help. Btw i am starting out with a x10hosting website, which i will have to learn html , and stuff. So if you know anything about x10hosting post that too! Give me all the tips you can! Be very criticizing. If you want to “show” me how to do something I have TeamViewer. If you want to talk to me i have skype, windows live , email etc! This is going to be a very big good game! Anything about forums using , website hosting , domains , all that I want to know everything I can and I will take all things into consideration. Plus read my forum post on “What would you like to see in a game” and post there too the link is: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,547048.0.html

Read full topic
item.source: I want to make a 2D, 3rd person , MMORPG [MOVE TOPIC TO CORRECT PLACE IF NEEDED]
